entry.tran: (尤指专唱20世纪三四十年代感伤情歌的)男歌手
entry.def: A crooner is a male singer who sings sentimental songs, especially the love songs of the 1930s and 1940s.

auth_sentence.content: Gone was angry, confrontational Bob; here was a smiling country crooner.
